title: Paolo Golf Swing
description: Taking a look at an amateur golf swing.  Notice how his wrist breaks early in his backswing preventing him from making a wide takeaway.  Video is taken from the Elbow Springs Golf Club in Calgary.

title: Chris Golf Swing
description: Taking a look at an amateur golf swing but this one is slightly better.  Only slightly.    Video is taken from the Lynx Ridge Golf Club in Calgary.

title: Vijay Singh at 2017 SCC Pro-Am
description: Vijay Singh tries to get on the green in 2 at the 2017 Shaw Charity Classic Pro-Am tournament at Canyon Meadows Golf and Country Club in Calgary.

title: Fred Couples at 2017 SCC Pro-Am
description: Fred Couples at the 18th teebox at the 2017 Shaw Charity Classic Pro-Am tournament at Canyon Meadows Golf and Country Club in Calgary.
